docs.text: 🌸 Welcome to Zen Spark Lab This is a space of curiosity, clarity, and comeback. Here, I explore data, creativity, and joy through notebooks, visuals, and stories. Every chart is a breath. Every commit, a step forward. Stay awhile, explore, and enjoy. — Fran 💜
